subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The former Florida quarterback Tim Tebow completed his first public workout with his new throwing motion Wednesday in Gainesville, Fla., hoping to impress N.F.L. general managers, coaches and scouts.
snippet: The former Florida quarterback Tim Tebow completed his first public workout with his new throwing motion Wednesday in Gainesville, Fla., hoping to impress N.F.L. general managers, coaches and scouts.
